column1: Local Authority (District/Borough, City, Metropolitan-  excludes Counties)
column3: Greatest overall risk of poverty taking account of multiple factors
column4: Greatest likelihood to contain those in current poverty
column5: Greatest likelihood to contain those who may fall into poverty in the short to medium term
column6: Greatest likelihood to contain those who may fall into poverty in the Longer Term Future
column7: Greatest likelihood to contain households whose income is less than 60% of the median for England
column8: Likelihood for the presence of households at risk of long term unemployment
column9: Likelihood for the presence of households at greatest risk of experiencing child poverty
column10: Greatest likelihood to contain households at risk of financial exclusion
column11: Greatest likelihood to contain households at risk of COPD
